ingredients.item: 1 tbsp Kikkoman Less Salt Soy Sauce
½ tsp grated fresh root ginger

instructions.step: For the dressing, mix the sesame oil, soy sauce, sherry vinegar, honey and ginger; set aside. Heat a griddle pan over a high heat. Brush the tuna steaks with the olive oil and season; griddle for 1-2 minutes on each side until the juices run clear, then set aside.

Pare long strips of carrot using a vegetable peeler and toss with the spinach and ½ the dressing. Divide between 2 plates. Top with the tuna then scatter over the pistachios and sesame seeds. Drizzle with the remaining dressing before serving.
